name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Identifiers assigned to this order instance by the orderer and/or the receiver and/or order fulfiller.

name: $addidentifier
desc: Identifiers assigned to this order instance by the orderer and/or the receiver and/or order fulfiller.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifiers assigned to this order instance by the orderer and/or the receiver and/or order fulfiller.

name: $definition
desc: Returns: Protocol or definition followed by this request.

name: $adddefinition
desc: Protocol or definition followed by this request.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Protocol or definition followed by this request.

name: $basedOn
desc: Returns: Plan/proposal/order fulfilled by this request.

name: $addbasedOn
desc: Plan/proposal/order fulfilled by this request.

name: $replaces
desc: Returns: The request takes the place of the referenced completed or terminated request(s).

name: $addreplaces
desc: The request takes the place of the referenced completed or terminated request(s).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The request takes the place of the referenced completed or terminated request(s).

name: $requisition
desc: Returns: A shared identifier common to all procedure or diagnostic requests that were authorized more or less simultaneously by a single author, representing the composite or group identifier.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A shared identifier common to all procedure or diagnostic requests that were authorized more or less simultaneously by a single author, representing the composite or group identifier.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The status of the order.

name: $intent
desc: Returns: Whether the request is a proposal, plan, an original order or a reflex order.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Whether the request is a proposal, plan, an original order or a reflex order.

name: $priority
desc: Returns: Indicates how quickly the ProcedureRequest should be addressed with respect to other requests.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates how quickly the ProcedureRequest should be addressed with respect to other requests.

name: $doNotPerform
desc: Returns: Set this to true if the record is saying that the procedure should NOT be performed.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Set this to true if the record is saying that the procedure should NOT be performed.

name: $category
desc: Returns: A code that classifies the procedure for searching, sorting and display purposes (e.g. "Surgical Procedure").

name: $addcategory
desc: A code that classifies the procedure for searching, sorting and display purposes (e.g. "Surgical Procedure").

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A code that classifies the procedure for searching, sorting and display purposes (e.g. "Surgical Procedure").

name: $code
desc: Returns: A code that identifies a particular procedure, diagnostic investigation, or panel of investigations, that have been requested.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A code that identifies a particular procedure, diagnostic investigation, or panel of investigations, that have been requested.

name: $subject
desc: Returns: On whom or what the procedure or diagnostic is to be performed. This is usually a human patient, but can also be requested on animals, groups of humans or animals, devices such as dialysis machines, or even locations (typically for environmental scans).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: On whom or what the procedure or diagnostic is to be performed. This is usually a human patient, but can also be requested on animals, groups of humans or animals, devices such as dialysis machines, or even locations (typically for environmental scans).

name: $context
desc: Returns: An encounter or episode of care that provides additional information about the healthcare context in which this request is made.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An encounter or episode of care that provides additional information about the healthcare context in which this request is made.

name: $authoredOn
desc: Returns: When the request transitioned to being actionable.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: When the request transitioned to being actionable.

name: $requester
desc: Returns: The individual who initiated the request and has responsibility for its activation.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The individual who initiated the request and has responsibility for its activation.

name: $performerType
desc: Returns: Desired type of performer for doing the diagnostic testing.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Desired type of performer for doing the diagnostic testing.

name: $performer
desc: Returns: The desired perfomer for doing the diagnostic testing.  For example, the surgeon, dermatopathologist, endoscopist, etc.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The desired perfomer for doing the diagnostic testing.  For example, the surgeon, dermatopathologist, endoscopist, etc.

name: $reasonCode
desc: Returns: An explanation or justification for why this diagnostic investigation is being requested in coded or textual form.   This is often for billing purposes.  May relate to the resources referred to in supportingInformation.

name: $addreasonCode
desc: An explanation or justification for why this diagnostic investigation is being requested in coded or textual form.   This is often for billing purposes.  May relate to the resources referred to in supportingInformation.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: An explanation or justification for why this diagnostic investigation is being requested in coded or textual form.   This is often for billing purposes.  May relate to the resources referred to in supportingInformation.

name: $reasonReference
desc: Returns: Indicates another resource that provides a justification for why this diagnostic investigation is being requested.   May relate to the resources referred to in supportingInformation.

name: $addreasonReference
desc: Indicates another resource that provides a justification for why this diagnostic investigation is being requested.   May relate to the resources referred to in supportingInformation.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Indicates another resource that provides a justification for why this diagnostic investigation is being requested.   May relate to the resources referred to in supportingInformation.

name: $supportingInfo
desc: Returns: Additional clinical information about the patient or specimen that may influence the procedure or diagnostics or their interpretations.     This information includes diagnosis, clinical findings and other observations.  In laboratory ordering these are typically referred to as "ask at order entry questions (AOEs)".  This includes observations explicitly requested by the producer (filler) to provide context or supporting information needed to complete the order. For example,  reporting the amount of inspired oxygen for blood gas measurements.

name: $addsupportingInfo
desc: Additional clinical information about the patient or specimen that may influence the procedure or diagnostics or their interpretations.     This information includes diagnosis, clinical findings and other observations.  In laboratory ordering these are typically referred to as "ask at order entry questions (AOEs)".  This includes observations explicitly requested by the producer (filler) to provide context or supporting information needed to complete the order. For example,  reporting the amount of inspired oxygen for blood gas measurements.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Additional clinical information about the patient or specimen that may influence the procedure or diagnostics or their interpretations.     This information includes diagnosis, clinical findings and other observations.  In laboratory ordering these are ty

name: $specimen
desc: Returns: One or more specimens that the laboratory procedure will use.

name: $addspecimen
desc: One or more specimens that the laboratory procedure will use.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: One or more specimens that the laboratory procedure will use.

name: $bodySite
desc: Returns: Anatomic location where the procedure should be performed. This is the target site.

name: $addbodySite
desc: Anatomic location where the procedure should be performed. This is the target site.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Anatomic location where the procedure should be performed. This is the target site.

name: $note
desc: Returns: Any other notes and comments made about the service request. For example, letting provider know that "patient hates needles" or other provider instructions.

name: $addnote
desc: Any other notes and comments made about the service request. For example, letting provider know that "patient hates needles" or other provider instructions.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Any other notes and comments made about the service request. For example, letting provider know that "patient hates needles" or other provider instructions.

name: $relevantHistory
desc: Returns: Key events in the history of the request.

name: $addrelevantHistory
desc: Key events in the history of the request.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Key events in the history of the request.
